item.Q:
Write the character:
to set; to fix; to determine; to decide; to order
item.A:
dìng
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character:
point; dot; (decimal) point); a little (usually 一点); o'clock; (classifier for small indeterminate quantities, jot); to order (food in a restaurant); (downwards-right convex character stroke)
item.A:
traditional: 點
diǎn
特点 (特點) tèdiǎn characteristic (feature); trait; feature

item.Q:
Write the character:
feeling; emotion; passion; situation
item.A:
qíng
情况 (情況) qíngkuàng circumstances; state of affairs; situation

item.Q:
Write the character:
topic; subject; to inscribe; to superscribe
item.A:
traditional: 題
tí
问题 (問題) wèntí question; problem; issue; topic

item.Q:
Write the character:
matter; thing; item; work; affair
item.A:
shì
事业 (事業) shìyè undertaking; project; activity; (charitable, political or revolutionary) cause; publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation

item.Q:
Write the character:
branch of study; administrative section; division; field; branch; stage directions; family (taxonomy); rules; laws; to mete out (punishment); to levy (taxes etc); to fine sb
item.A:
kē
科学 (科學) kēxué science; scientific knowledge; scientific

item.Q:
Write the character:
square; quadrilateral; direction; one side; just; surname
item.A:
fāng
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character:
some; few; several; (a measure word)
item.A:
xiē
这些 (這些) zhèxiē these

item.Q:

clear; distinct; complete; pure; the Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)

qīng

sān

item.Q:
Write the character: dìng
(yīdìng de dìng)
item.A:
to set; to fix; to determine; to decide; to order
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character: diǎn
(tèdiǎn de diǎn)
item.A:
traditional: 點
point; dot; (decimal) point); a little (usually 一点); o'clock; (classifier for small indeterminate quantities, jot); to order (food in a restaurant); (downwards-right convex character stroke)
特点 (特點) tèdiǎn characteristic (feature); trait; feature

item.Q:
Write the character: sān
(sānjiǎoxíng de sān)
item.A:
three; 3
三角形 sānjiǎoxíng triangle
yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular
bùdìng indefinite; adventitious; indeterminate
dìngzǐ stator
dìngxīn centering

traditional: 定時
dìngshí timing
dìngběn definitive edition
dìngrán certainly

traditional: 定當
dìngdāng should
dìngdōu choose a site for the capital
fǎdìng legal; statutory; rightful

traditional: 說不定
shuōbudìng can't say for sure; maybe

traditional: 中點
zhōngdiǎn midpoint; half-way point

traditional: 交點
jiāodiǎn meeting point; point of intersection

traditional: 地點
dìdiǎn place; site; location

traditional: 定點
dìngdiǎn fixed point or location; point of reference; (math.) fixed point; to determine a location

traditional: 有點
yǒudiǎn a little

traditional: 要點
yàodiǎn main point; essential

traditional: 點子
diǎnzi (n) spot, dot; speck; (of a liquid) droplet; drop; key point, crux; idea, pointer

traditional: 點心
diǎnxīn light refreshments; pastry; Dim Sum (in Cantonese cooking); dessert
jiāoqing friendship; emotional relations between people
rénqíng reason; human emotions; human interaction; social relationship; friendship; favor; a good turn
tóngqíng compassion; relent; sympathize; sympathy

traditional: 國情
guóqíng (n) country's basic condition or state
duōqíng full of tenderness or affection for a person of t
xīnqíng mood; frame of mind
qíngrén lover; sweatheart

traditional: 無情
wúqíng pitiless; ruthless; merciless; heartless

traditional: 發情
fāqíng oestrus
zhēnqíng real situation; the truth
zhīqíng to know the facts; to understand; to be familiar with the situation

traditional: 說情
shuōqíng (v) plead for sb else
dàoqíng information

traditional: 問題
wèntí question; problem; issue; topic

traditional: 本題
běntí the subject under discussion; the point at issue
shìshì everything
shìqíng affair; matter; thing; business
rénshì personnel
tóngshì colleague; co-worker
duōshì meddlesome; eventful
dàshì a major event; (do something) in a big way
hǎoshì good action, deed, thing or work (also sarcastic, "a fine thing indeed"); charity; happy occasion; Daoist or Buddhist ceremony for the souls of the dead
jīashì housework
gōngshì a defensive structure; a fortification; structures used to protect troops
xīnshì a load on one's mind; worry
qíngshì case; phenomenon; circumstance; feelings

traditional: 時事
shíshì current trends; the present situation; how things are going
běnshì ability; skill; source material; original story

traditional: 當事人
dāngshìrén persons involved or implicated; party (to an affair)
néngshì particular abilities; one's forte
tóngkē siblings

traditional: 學科
xuékē subject; branch of learning; course
gōngkē engineering
běnkē undergraduate course; regular college course

traditional: 科學
kēxué science; scientific knowledge; scientific

traditional: 科學家
kēxuéjīa scientist

traditional: 自然科學
zìránkēxué natural sciences
qiánfāng ahead; the front
dìfang area; place; local
duōfāng in many ways; from all sides

dàfang generous; magnanimous; poise; a great moral principle
dàfāng expert; scholar; mother earth (cf 大地, because the earth is square 地方); a type of green tea

traditional: 對方
duìfāng counterpart; other person involved; opposite side; other side; receiving party

traditional: 後方
hòufāng the rear; far behind the front line
fāngfǎ method; way; means
yīxiē some; a few; a little
hǎoxiē a good deal of; quite a lot
yǒuxiē some; somewhat

traditional: 這些
zhèxie these
zhèxiē these
nàxiē those
qīngxīn fresh and clean

traditional: 清點
qīngdiǎn clean-up

traditional: 還清
huánqīng to pay back in full; to redeem a debt

traditional: 三國
Sānguó Three Kingdoms period following the break-up of the Han (220-280 AD); several Three Kingdoms periods in Korean history, esp. from first century AD to unification under Silla 新羅|新罗 in 658 AD
sāndìng three laws
